name: DUNGEON CLEANER - Alpha
description:
╰══════•>💜<•══════╯
Dungeon Cleaner is a game currently in development by @Hollow_Neko_ (artist) and @Elvendwarf (programmer).

The game idea originated from a GameJam with the theme "void", what lead Elven to choose an *empty* bubble as the main character.

Everything but that, including game mechanics, has changed, resulting in a more fast-paced and movement-based gameplay.

We started with the "remake" on February 2022, and we've kept with it non-stop since then (however, dealing with studies, personal affairs and so on)

Our objective is to bring everyone a brand new rogue-lite experience, with a more colorful design, and focusing more on characters and their lore.
